title: Help?????

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
First of all, i have been having errors with The LoL Client for months on end so i decided to dealte the game since i was getting no awsnwer to my problem, and now i decided to re install LoL and ive again come accross a problem, it asked me to upgrade to the alpha client which i happily did, and when i clicked launch this error popped up (see picture) i dont know how to re-install the alpha client but i then went ahead and uninstalled and reinstalled the game one again. Did the whole process again, now with the same occuring error, help me anyone? what do i need to do??
[](http://imgur.com/a/3TU76)

replies.body: It looks like your files may have become corrupt during installation.  In this case, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)would be necessary to repair those files.  Once complete, you can proceed with re-downloading the updated client.  I hope that helps!
they're giving me problems too, have you had a trollish history? see my posts they make me redo the installation so i can't play half the time so they don't have to deal with my shenanigans.
